Newbie Helper:
Hello! Now I'll give you a task. See Gremlin's around? They stole a precious Blue Gemstone.
Your task - to bring him back. You must destroy the Gremlin's.
To attack a monster, hover over it and click the left mouse button. The cursor will turn into a sword. In this state, you must re-press the left mouse button, and you will begin to attack.
Try using "Soul Cry" before the attack. You will see that level of attack will increase. Use this skill, you can use the key F2, and when it is pressed again "Soul Cry" is disabled.

If you have successfully coped with the task, I will give you a useful item. Good luck!
